thread.title: New Planet Fitness Coming to Weatherford
thread.title_full: New Planet Fitness Coming to Weatherford - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: New Planet Fitness Coming to Weatherford
text:
Planet Fitness
Planet Fitness announces another judgment-free 20,000 square foot location in Texas!
WEATHERFORD, Texas , Oct. 21, Planet Fitness, the innovative health club franchise known for its Judgment Free Zone 速 and affordable prices, announced a new location coming to 1924 S. Main Street in Weatherford . The 20,550 sf club is slated to open early December.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151020/278633
"We pride ourselves in our Judgment Free Zone at Planet Fitness. Our mission is to offer a non-intimidating environment for exercising at an affordable price," said Jason Frick , President of PF-TO Management, LLC. "Our club in Weatherford will be the most state-of-the-art gym in the area."
Known as The Judgment Free Zone速, Planet Fitness stands apart from other health clubs by providing a relaxed, non-intimidating atmosphere. The Weatherford club will be open and staffed 24/7 and will feature a wide variety of brand new equipment. A certified fitness trainer will be on staff at no additional charge and fitness instruction sessions called PE@PF, in a small-group setting, are available throughout the week and are always included in every membership.
The heart of Planet Fitness offers an extensive selection of cardio equipment including treadmills, ellipticals, arc trainers, and stationary bikes all pointed at 70" televisions for member entertainment while working out. Planet Fitness also offers a popular 30-minute PF Express circuit room, dedicated abs/stretching room, a full complement of user-friendly strength equipment and full locker rooms that include free day-use lockers, private changing rooms and tile showers.
The PF Black Card速 membership which is $19.99 a month includes additional amenities such as the ability to bring a guest every day at no additional charge, access to the more than 1,000 clubs in the Planet Fitness chain, as well as use of massage chairs*, HydroMassage beds*, tanning* and Total Body Enhancement booths*, and 50 percent off select cooler drinks.
About Planet Fitness
Founded in 1992 in Dover, N.H. , Planet Fitness is one of the largest and fastest-growing franchisors and operators of fitness centers in the United States by number of members and locations. With more than 1,000 locations in 47 states, Puerto Rico , and Canada , Planet Fitness' mission is to enhance people's lives by providing a high-quality fitness experience in a welcoming, non-intimidating environment, which we call the Judgment Free Zone速. More than 90% of Planet Fitness stores are owned and operated by independent business men and women.

Jason Frick
Planet Fitness
